trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: The MenuCommandService class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> interface, which is the managed interface used to add handlers for menu commands and to define verbs.
trans-unit.target: MenuCommandService klassen implementerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>interface, som er administrert grensesnittet som brukes til å legge til behandlingsprogrammer for kommandoer og definere verb.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>

trans-unit.source: The MenuCommandService class is automatically offered by the package class to offer global commands for an entire package, and it is also offered by the `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.WindowPane` class to offer commands for the current window.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MenuCommandService gis automatisk av pakken klassen å tilby globale kommandoer for en hele pakken og tilbys også av den `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.WindowPane` klassen for å tilby kommandoer for gjeldende vindu.

trans-unit.source: This offering is always done through the service container, so anyone deriving from the package or window pane classes can remove or replace the default implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> interface.
trans-unit.target: Dette tilbudet alltid gjøres via beholderen, så alle avledes fra pakken, eller vinduet ruten klasser kan fjerne eller erstatte standard implementering av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>

trans-unit.source: The MenuCommandService class utilizes several other services.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MenuCommandService benytter flere tjenester.

trans-unit.source: All of these services are optional, so the behavior of the MenuCommandService class degrades if one or more services are missing.
trans-unit.target: Alle disse tjenestene er valgfri, og virkemåten for klassen MenuCommandService reduseres hvis mangler én eller flere tjenester.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows which services are used and for what purpose.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hvilke tjenester brukes, og hvilke formålet.

trans-unit.source: |Service|Purpose| |-------------|-------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService>|Used to discover the current selection in order to obtain verbs offered by the currently selected designer.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>|Used to obtain the designer for the currently selected component, if any.| |`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.Interop.IVsUIShell`|Used to notify [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] that the command status has changed.| |`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.Interop.IOleComponentUIManager`|Used to show context menus.|
trans-unit.target: | Tjenesten | Formålet | |-------------|-------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService>| Brukes til å finne det merkede området for å hente verb som tilbys av den valgte utformeren. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>| Brukes til å hente utformeren for den valgte komponenten eventuell. | | `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.Interop.IVsUIShell`| Brukes til å varsle [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] som kommandoen statusen er endret. | | `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.Interop.IOleComponentUIManager`| Brukes til å vise hurtigmenyer. |</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: If the service is being used with a designer, the `serviceProvider` parameter should be the service provider for the designer, as is the case with <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tjenesten brukes med en designer i `serviceProvider` -parameteren må være tjenesteleverandøren for designeren som skiller med <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: The service provider that this service uses to obtain other services.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteleverandøren som denne tjenesten brukes til å hente andre tjenester.

trans-unit.source: Adds a command handler to the menu command service.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et behandlingsprogram for kommandoen i menyen kommandoen tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The AddCommand method adds a command handler to the menu command service.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AddCommand legger til et behandlingsprogram for kommandoen i menyen kommandoen tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Command handlers do not define the text, shortcut, or placement of a menu item.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoen behandlingsprogrammer definerer ikke teksten, snarvei eller plasseringen av et menyelement.

trans-unit.source: Rather, they define the menu item’s behavior if the item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: De definerer i stedet menyelementene virkemåte Hvis elementet klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: command is .
trans-unit.target: commandis .

trans-unit.source: A command handler command already exists.
trans-unit.target: Et behandlingsprogram for kommandoen command finnes allerede.

trans-unit.source: Adds a verb to the verb table of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et verb verbet tabellen for den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This verb is available regardless of what designer is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Dette verbet er tilgjengelig uansett hvilken designer er valgt.

trans-unit.source: Unlike menu commands, verbs can define the text that is displayed to the user, but they do not define the placement of the command on the actual menu.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til kommandoer, verb kan definere tekst som vises for brukeren, men de definerer ikke plasseringen av kommandoen på selve menyen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: verb is .
trans-unit.target: verbis .

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Opp fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>ble bruker.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()`metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>referanser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the verb list has been created.
trans-unit.target: Sikrer at listen verbet er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The EnsureVerbs method creates the verb list if it has not already been created.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EnsureVerbs oppretter verb-listen hvis det ikke er allerede er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> associated with the given command ID.
trans-unit.target: Søker etter den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> knyttet til den angitte kommando-IDen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"> </xref> til å finne.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> associated with the given command; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the command is not found.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> knyttet til den angitte kommandoen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis kommandoen ikke blir funnet.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> associated with the given command.
trans-unit.target: Søker etter den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> knyttet til den angitte kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: The GUID of the command.
trans-unit.target: GUIDEN for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the command.
trans-unit.target: IDen for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> associated with the given command; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the command is not found.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> knyttet til den angitte kommandoen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis kommandoen ikke blir funnet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the command list for a given GUID.
trans-unit.target: Henter kommandolisten for en gitt GUID.

trans-unit.source: The GUID of the command list.
trans-unit.target: GUIDEN for kommandolisten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of commands.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>med kommandoer.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the requested service.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>på tjenesten som skal hente.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A reference to serviceType; otherwise, if the service is not found.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til serviceType ; ellers Hvis tjenesten ikke finnes.

trans-unit.source: serviceType is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Invokes the given command on the local form or in the global environment.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer den angitte kommandoen i skjemaet lokale eller globale miljøet.

trans-unit.source: The local form is first searched for the given command ID.
trans-unit.target: Skjemaet lokale først søkes for den angitte kommando IDen.

trans-unit.source: If it is found, it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den finnes, aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the command ID is passed to the global environment command handler, if one is available.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, sendt kommando-IDen til globale miljøet kommandoen behandlingsprogrammet Hvis det finnes.

trans-unit.source: The command to invoke.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoen for å aktivere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the command was found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, Hvis kommandoen ble funnet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the given command with the given parameter on the local form or in the global environment.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer den angitte kommandoen parameteren angitt i skjemaet lokale eller globale miljøet.

trans-unit.source: The local form is first searched for the given command ID.
trans-unit.target: Skjemaet lokale først søkes for den angitte kommando IDen.

trans-unit.source: If it is found, it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den finnes, aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the command ID is passed to the global environment command handler, if one is available.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, sendt kommando-IDen til globale miljøet kommandoen behandlingsprogrammet Hvis det finnes.

trans-unit.source: The command to invoke.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoen for å aktivere.

trans-unit.source: A parameter for the invocation.
trans-unit.target: En parameter for aktivering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the command was found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, Hvis kommandoen ble funnet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the status of a menu command has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når statusen for en kommando er endret.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.MenuCommandsChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.MenuCommandsChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnCommandsChanged method is called by a menu command when its status has changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnCommandsChanged kalles av en kommando når statusen er endret.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnCommandsChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnCommandsChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Removes the given menu command from the document.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner den angitte kommandoen fra dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: If there are no more commands in the command group, the group is removed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen flere kommandoer i kommandogruppen, fjernes gruppen.

trans-unit.source: The command to remove.
trans-unit.target: For å fjerne.

trans-unit.source: command is .
trans-unit.target: commandis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the given verb from the document.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner det angitte verbet fra dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: The verb to remove.
trans-unit.target: Verb for å fjerne.

trans-unit.source: verb is .
trans-unit.target: verbis .

trans-unit.source: Shows the shortcut menu with the given command ID at the given location.
trans-unit.target: Viser hurtigmenyen med den angitte kommando IDen på den angitte plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering gjøre noe.

trans-unit.source: The shortcut menu to display.
trans-unit.target: Hurtigmenyen skal vises.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the shortcut menu's location.
trans-unit.target: X-koordinaten for plasseringen av hurtigmenyen.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the shortcut menu's location.
trans-unit.target: Y-koordinaten for den hurtigmenyen plassering.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the designer verbs that are currently available.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av designer verb som er tilgjengelige.

trans-unit.source: The Verbs property provides a collection of verbs.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen verb gir en samling av verb.

trans-unit.source: These verbs come from two places: - Verbs added through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A> method of Verbs.
trans-unit.target: Disse verb kommer fra to steder:-verb som er lagt til i <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>metode for verb.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Verbs offered by the currently selected designer.
trans-unit.target: -Verb som tilbys av den valgte utformeren.

trans-unit.source: Verbs added to this service through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A> method are called global verbs because they are global to this service, but generally there is one instance of this service for each tool or document window.
trans-unit.target: Verb som er lagt til denne tjenesten ved hjelp av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>metoden kalles globale verb fordi de globale til denne tjenesten, men det er vanligvis en forekomst av denne tjenesten for hvert verktøyet eller dokumentet vindu.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A>

trans-unit.source: Designer verbs are obtained by querying the service provider for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService>.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsutformer verb hentes ved å spørre tjenesteleverandøren for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: If the selection service offers a primary selection, and a designer can be obtained for that selection from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>, the designer’s verbs are added to this list.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tjenesten utvalget inneholder en primær utvalg, og kan hente en utformer for dette utvalget fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>, den utformeren verb er lagt til i denne listen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: If the name of a global verb conflicts with the name of a designer verb, the designer-provided designer verb takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Hvis navnet på et global verb som er i konflikt med navnet på et designer verb, blir det angitte designer designer verbet gjeldende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection"></xref> of the designer verbs that are currently available.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection"> </xref> over designer verb som er tilgjengelige.
